sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Home Depot topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.0%.
Year to date, Home Depot registers a 4.3% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Nike, trading down 3.2%.
Nike is showing a gain of 24.5% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Intel, trading down 2.1%, and Verizon Communications, trading up 0.8% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
